title: Incredible history and views
text:
Visiting the Acropolis to see the Parthenon was the main reason we wanted to travel to Athens, it did not disappoint the views were amazing.
We booked a 1.5 hour group tour with Get Your Guide which was a huge disappointment, the information delivered by our guide was muddled and rushed. It would have been better to read from our guidebook as we saw the sights on the way to the top.
We visited Athens in March, the weather was great but more importantly the volume of people was much more manageable to see the sights without huge crowds.
The Acropolis was one of the highlights of our holiday to Athens but maybe think about exploring yourself or with a private guide.

title: Average food, poor service
text: When we arrived at the restaurant for dinner it was very quiet, it had no atmosphere. The food was average but the service was terrible. We had to keep asking the waiter when we wanted to order or get the bill. We would not come back here to eat.

title: Guide didn't show up
text:
We booked this tour very excited to explore Hamburg at night. However our tour guide did not turn up! After waiting a while we called her and she said she had emailed us to cancel but we received nothing. Another couple also waiting said had received no communication from her either.
We were very disappointed and it wasted a valuable evening in Hamburg, better communication please!

title: So good we came back again!
text: We came here for dinner and the burgers were incredible, the best burgers we have ever had! We did want to try the shakes but were so full after dinner we came back for lunch the next day to try them. We were not disappointed, the shakes were amazing as well! We would come back here again if we were to visit Hamburg again.

title: Amazing food and flawless service
text: We had a great meal at Meatery. Our waiter was very welcoming and informative, he made our whole experience a delight. Our steaks were amazing and we would definitely return if we were to visit Hamburg again.

title: Stylish hotel and great location
text:
This hotel had stylish decor and the rooms were very modern and clean. However the air con was insufficient and when we questioned the staff about changing the temperature we were told the air con could not be changed even though this was not the case in my sisters room. The staff behind the front desk were not helpful and really let our hotel experience down.
The location was perfect for exploring Hamburg and we loved the area.

title: Fantastic personalised walking tour of Athens
text:
We booked this tour as we wanted an in-depth tour about Greek mythology. Our tour guide Ioannis was very informative, funny and approachable. Our tour was tailored to our interests and requests. It was great to have a one-on-one tour around the historic city. Ioannis also gave us restaurant recommendations as we walked round the different districts.
This was a great way to explore Athens and was the best tour we did on our holiday. We would highly recommend this tour, thank you Ioannis!
place: Athens Legends: Gods and Myths Private Tour

title: Amazing trip to Delphi from Athens, not to be missed!
text:
We booked last minute onto this tour and was not disappointed. Our driver was Billy, he drove and gave us all the information we would need at Delphi and for the museum as he was not allowed to accompany us in these places. This worked out well as we had our information and could take our time seeing the sights and taking photos as we pleased.
We stopped for lunch in Arachova on the way back to Athens which was a good photo opportunity.
Delphi was an incredible day trip and not to be missed when visiting Athens. Billy made the day easy and stress free and I would highly recommend if you are thinking about visiting Delphi for a day. Thank you Billy!
place: From Athens: Full-Day Bus Trip to Delphi & Arachova (fixed price per person)

title: Highly recommend for a stay in Athens
text:
We booked this hotel due to the great TripAdvisor reviews and the cheap price. This hotel is amazing value for money. Our Acropolis view room had a great view, was quiet and was very clean. We ordered room service a few times and the food, especially the dessert was incredible and I would highly recommend it. The staff were always helpful and very knowledgable. The hotel is in an excellent location and is walkable to all the main attractions.
I would highly recommend this hotel and would come back again if we were to visit Athens.

title: A must visit!
text: We travelled from Birmingham UK to do the two Ernie Hudson rooms on recommendation, we were not disappointed, they are amazing! The set design, the story and the puzzles provide an immersive experience which has a perfect balance of challenge and enjoyment. The staff were also lovely, thank you!

title: Terrible service
text:
I visited Juju’s for the second time yesterday and want to express how unsatisfactory the service was both today and on my previous visit.

The first time we visited your staff were rude and uninterested but we put this down to a one off so tried again today but had a similar experience.

Today when we entered we stood and waited for about ten minutes with no staff acknowledging us, even though they were constantly walking past and were blatantly avoiding eye contact with us. We were then told it would be a five to ten minute wait, even though there were 3 tables that had been empty since our arrival and had not been cleared. We then waited well over 20 minutes to be seated and once seated had to wait further 20 minutes with no greeting or drinks order. I then went up to the bar to ask to be served and finally someone came over. We then waited 25 minutes for the food, which is fine, but the drinks arrived after the food.

We just had the feeling during the whole visit that we were an inconvenience and felt uncomfortable. Which is surprising as your reviews are so good, but this is the second bad experience we have had there.

title: We escape and keep coming back!
text:
We have tried 3 rooms at Clue HQ (and have escaped 2 of them). Our group of 4 do escape rooms wherever we can and the rooms at Clue HQ have been really fun. The rooms are well thought through, have great themes and are very immersive. The staff are friendly and very helpful. I would recommend to friends and family and I will be buying gift vouchers from Clue HQ as Christmas presents this year.

We have just booked in to do Captain Riddle's Forgotten Fortune so fingers crossed we escape!
place: Clue HQ - The Live Escape Game

title: Must do boat trip
text: We had such an enjoyable trip. Great value for money and probably the best thing we did in skye. Highly recommended trip. Thanks so much Malcolm.

title: Peaceful stay, thanks Mark
text: We were welcomed by Mark who was very friendly and knowledgeable about the area. The lodge is in a spectacular location and very quiet. Had the best nights sleep our whole trip. Breakfast was a great idea - in room with grab and go bag - very generous. They sell whisky bottles which was good for the evening and just pay at checkout. Would definitely recommend to friends and family and will return if in the area again. Wished we had more than one night. Thanks Mark!

title: Enjoyed our stay
text: Good location short walk to the centre. Independent check in and out via key lock box made things easy. Kitchen was generously stocked with food and drink. Good wifi and smart TV. Bedrooms simple and clean. Bed was very soft but still slept well. Close by parking. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Felt very welcome
text: Hosts were so welcoming as soon as we arrived. We were given a tour which included a spacious communal lounge and kitchen. Board games. Clean simple bedroom. Location is beautiful with a free 5 min ferry across to the pub. Great value for money we were glad we stayed here.

title: Perfect for a weekend break
text: Great location. Rooms well laid out with all essentials. Very clean. Very quiet despite close proximity to the centre. Large lobby, good wifi. I would stay with this company again here or elsewhere. Had a great nights sleep!

title: Food of the highest quality
text: Beautiful flavours and textures with attentive and friendly service. This is the place to go eat in birmingham at the moment. Absolutely amazing.

title: Perfect location
text: Hotel staff very friendly and welcoming. Room was lovely, clean with a good aircon system and wifi. Shower was big. Location is so central it is perfect for walking to all tourist sights. And as the rooms are down a small side street it is not noisy which was good. Would stay here again. Thanks Simona!

title: Tasty food, quick service, friendly staff
text: Had seen locals recommended this restaurant. We had beef and cannelloni and both dishes tasted like authentic home cooked italian food. Waitress was attentive. Service was quick. Probably our best meal in Florence - and well priced too. Thanks!

title: Fun cocktails
text: A very quirky bar, the barman was attentive and enthusiastic about the drinks. Lots of choice of different cocktails and spirits and virgin cocktails too. Free popcorn was a nice addition. Enjoyed our evening!

title: Rude staff, wouldnt reccomend
text:
On arrival we were greeted with ‘you didn’t tell us you were checking in a day later’. After our flight was cancelled 5 days before our trip due to transport strikes in Italy, through expedia we had informed the hotel we were coming a day later due to the flight change. We had written email confirmation of this change. But the hotel reception staff told us initially that they had given the room away (despite us still paying for the two nights) and we were ‘lucky to still get a room’ as someone else hadnt arrived. Luckily we had the email trail on our phone to prove that we had in fact contacted the hotel, despite them trying to blame us for their error. It was poor customer service and unprofessional.
The location of the hotel was perfect for walking to tourist sights and the room was clean. However our room was tired and shabby, the air con didnt work and was noisy when we had the window open as the hotel was close to the university.
We would not come back here and we would not recommend to friends and family.

title: Great choice, would come back
text: We were welcomed with excellent service. The location is great because you can easily and quickly walk to all the tourist sites, without it being noisy at the hotel. It has a beautiful roof top terrace with stunning views. Wifi is fast. Staff friendly. Great air con. Thank you for a lovely stay.

title: Nice atmosphere
text: There is a good atmosphere, bench seating which was actually fine. The food is well priced for the quality. I have seen reviews saying this is the best pizza outside of Italy, my pizza wasn’t at that level but it was still very nice.

title: So cheap
text: The pizza is very tasty, the price is fantastic - the pizza is very cheap but the quality is still high.

title: Perfect location for a tourist visit
text: The location is fantastic for visiting tourist sites. I don’t think it could be better. The WiFi is high speed. The rooms are simple and clean. At times it was a bit noisy with doors slamming in the corridors and we could hear taps running from the other rooms. Parking is in a car park around 10 mins walk from the hotel, this is slightly inconvenient however the hotel is so central that it was worth it.

title: Great visit
text: The castle itself is full of fascinating history. Tips are - book in advance as we skipped the long queue to buy tickets, and go on the free introductory tour which runs every 30 mins and was great.

title: Good basic room
text: The parking was very easy but we had to pay extra. The WiFi was very good, we could watch films with no buffering. Our room very clean and quiet. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The location is close the centre and easy to walk to restaurants nearby

title: Tasty Indian Tapas
text: This was my first visit here. The atmosphere was nice and the staff were very attentive. There was plenty to choose from on the menu. We decided to go for the tapas option and ordered 7 dishes between two of us. The food arrived very quickly and was delicious. I would definitely come back here for a second visit!

title: Go to this restaurant!
text: We visited as a family, the meal was superb. The staff were outstanding and provided excellent and friendly service, we felt well looked after throughout the entire meal. There were little extra things that the staff did that made all the difference - thanks so much. And the food was of the highest quality, in fact many at the table felt their food was the best they have ever eaten. If you are thinking of visiting then please do, you will have a fantastic meal in a relaxed and friendly environment.

title: Spooky
text: Well organised. Interesting content. Spooky at times especially with all the death masks. Included in the ticket is an experience where you get 'arrested' which was quite a fun and informative way of seeing the gaol.

title: Good views
text: Went on a clear day. Good panoramic views with reference maps to help orientate. Although a bit pricey it is probably worth it.

title: Penguin Parade!
text: Peter was our guide. Amazing day out on a trip to Phillip Island. We fed kangaroos, ate cheese, drank wine and saw little penguins coming into shore. Peter was great, knowledgable and funny. He also gave us great tips on the best places to sit when watching the penguin parade. Great tour, definitely recommend.

title: Great stopover for great ocean road trip
text: Clean and comfortable room. Staff friendly and advised on places to see and eat close by. I have stayed elsewhere in Port Campbell before and this place is definitely a nice place to stay. Would recommend it to anyone stopping over on their great ocean road trip!

title: Great setting for an outdoor cinema
text: The bats that fly overhead are worth the attendance themselves. It is in a lovely location and a fun way to watch a film and spend an evening. Trick is to come prepared - bring a picnic, warm clothes and blankets. We didnt buy a beanbag but I think we would next time as they looked comfy.

title: Spectacular views. Thanks Phoebe!
text: Phoebe was our guide and she was great - funny and knowledgable and made the experience even better, her ability to remember names is also impressive and it makes a difference. This is not a difficult walk from an exercise perspective and the guides give plenty of opportunity to rest. The views are spectacular and well worth the climb. Although it is expensive, it is an extremely organised and well run tour - worth the money and one to tick off the bucket list.

title: Perfect location
text: Location is excellent for getting everywhere you need to in Melbourne. Wifi was good speed and free. Room had a frosted window that opened minimally with no view to outside which wasnt the nicest. But bathroom was clean with a good shower. Room was tidy and clean.

title: Stylish rooms
text: Is in a good location for accessing the city, although the side street it is on had building works ongoing. Very clean and stylish room. Wifi ok, not very fast but fine for general use. Good TV channel selection. Friendly staff. Clean room.

title: Great walking tour
text: Went on a tour with Matt. Good concept for a tour where there is no set price but at the end encouraged to pay what you think the tour was worth. This is a good introduction tour to melbourne, would advise doing it early in your visit so you can take advantage of the tips for places to eat/drink/see.

title: Fun!
text: Very well organised, the ride is a thrill, great driver. We also bought the pack at the end with photos and video which are good to keep as memories.

title: Good location and lovely hotel
text: This is central hotel in a good location, only a very short walk right to the town centre and very near Queenstown gardens. They ran out of car park spaces at the hotel (we were told you cant prebook them) but there is free road parking opposite. We stayed in the superior room, it was lovely and we would definitely recommend it. We had room service food which was very tasty and reasonably priced. The wifi was fast and free (just need to get the code every 24 hours). The only issue was the shower water changed from warm to cold when showering which was annoying. Friendly staff. Will stay here again when we return to Queenstown.

title: $15 pizza or spag bol
text: We ate here using the deal of $15 pizza or spaghetti bolognese at 4:30-6pm. It is great value and the food was delicious.

title: Beautiful views and lovely horses
text: Booked river wild tour. Well organised, checked in and picked up gear and then driven to site with horses, then all allocated horses and went on our way. We were a mixed ability couple with one of us very experienced and the other only ridden a couple of times. The standard was therefore perfect for us as we only walked and trotted. The horses are very well behaved and the highlight was crossing some rivers. The views and surroundings really are spectacular, it was a beautiful ride. Our guides Julia and Rowley were great and told us a bit about some of the filming which was done nearby.

title: Great
text: Great location, friendly and helpful staff. Room clean and comfortable. Free parking. Wifi signal was not good in our room, but would be fine if we went outside the room. There was a movie channel on the TV that played some great films!

title: Tasty
text: Lovely food, staff also friendly and welcoming. Had a really tasty meal and we were pleased we went here for our evening.

title: Tasty tacos!
text: The tacos here are gorgeous, try the fish! Cool little place, serving fresh food at very reasonable prices. We will definitely be returning for more! The sauces are also tasty. The lady serving was friendly too. What a lovely place.

title: Dan the driver!
text: This was a lovely day, we were lucky as the weather was beautiful and warm. The coach driver Dan was fantastic, we found him hilarious! Dan definitely made the trip even better, thanks!
place: InterCity Milford Sound Day Tour + Cruise from Queenstown

title: Good stay
text: Bed very comfortable. Decor old english feel consistent through the hotel. Wifi signal did not quite reach our room, but we didnt mind this. Room service dinner was good. Used laundry machines which were cheap and easy.

title: Crumble!
text: Small and well chosen menu. Waiting staff attentive. Food was delicious, recommend the crumble for pudding. Would return again, a lovely little restaurant.

title: Love Logan Brown
text: Enjoyed the bistro menu, which we booked for a birthday meal. The decor is beautiful. The waiters provided excellent service. The food was gorgeous, we definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone in or visiting Wellington!

title: Excellent stay thank you
text: Felt welcome immediately from arrival, easy to access if driving as car park straight off the Terrace, valet parking (although it does cost to park overnight). Breakfast was one of the nicest hotel breakfasts we have had, lots of options for cold or cooked breakfast, there is even an area where you can have fresh omelettes made (or pancakes, eggs). Wifi free and fast. Rooms clean and comfortable. Location very central.

title: Lovely views, wifi annoying.
text: Nice and clean with views of lake Taupo. Is in a great location. However the wifi was annoying, we were given a login and password that we had to reenter each time we wanted to use the internet rather than just logging in once for our stay. Bit noisy in the morning from people in the car park.

title: Excellent food!
text: The food was gorgeous, very fresh. Definitely would recommend having the sushi. Also had gyoza and a couple of noodle dishes. All very tasty. Staff were friendly with fast and attentive service. Would definitely return.

title: Fantastic tour- Thanks Wendy!
text: Prebooked the weta workshop tour. Very well organised, Wendy was our tour guide - she was very informative, funny and made the experience special. We saw props made and used for a variety of films, it was interesting to hear how they are made and some behind the scenes stories.

title: Clean, comfortable B&B
text: Great location for visiting the caves, also opposite huhu cafe which is a lovely restaurant. Owners hospitable and knowledgeable about how to get the most out of our stay including a nice recommended short walk nearby. Breakfast was good, communal and social feel with time to chat with other guests. Free wifi too. Free parking.

title: Good views and food
text: Tasty evening meal after a day of cave exploring. Staff were very attentive and professional. Restaurant is not massive so may be worth booking a table in advance. We sat outside with good views. Puddings were lovely - save room!

title: Staff lovely, food excellent
text: We visited this restaurant as we were staying nearby. The staff were so friendly immediately from arrival until we left. Food was very tasty, we would definitely return again.

title: Stay here if in rotorua!
text: Very friendly staff who were very helpful. Large clean room. Quiet. Helpful room folder including recommended local food. Good free wifi. Laundry facility was useful and clean. Easy and free parking right outside the rooms. If returning to the area in the future we will come back here.

title: Great for Tolkien fans and film lovers
text: Well organised tour with beautiful backdrop. Got a drink at the end included which is a nice touch. Lots of photo opportunities. Tour guide was knowledgeable. Would have been even better if there was a hobbit hole which had an interior set to view.

title: Amazing natural wonders
text: Beautiful caves, knowledgable and enthusiastic tour guide. Highlight was the boat ride at the end of the tour which was incredibly peaceful. We also did the Ruakuri cave tour which went well alongside the glowworm tour.

title: Great location
text: Stayed here for 4 nights. It is an excellent location, walkable to most major attractions and also near metro station if need to travel further out. As is so close to termini you can get the train from the airport easily. Friendly and welcoming staff, free wifi with a good connection speed, good breakfast with a variety of choices. Only issue was the room was hot and no air conditioning, but overall would happily stay here again.

title: Colosseum
text: Amazing attraction a must see! Highly recommend the official tour, it was an hour long and was great to help visualise what it was like at the time.

title: Great little pizzeria
text: Went here for our final evening in rome, great atmosphere and friendly service. Recommend the calzone.

title: Hot chocolate!
text: The hot chocolate here is amazing. Great ice creams and crepes, smiley service. Fun decor. A very nice little place near our hotel, a must go for a cheeky desert!

title: Excellent
text: This was our best meal in rome. Fantastic restaurant with friendly service. The panna cotta was gorgeous. When returning to rome we will be returning here, highly recommend it.
